snippet.title: IF FOUND... | Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
If Found… is an interactive visual novel from Dreamfeel about searching for connection. Coming soon to PC, Mac, and iOS. Add it to your Steam wishlist here:   https://annapurna.link/Found

Achill Island, December 31st 1993. In the crumbling ruin of an old mansion, a young Irish woman named Kasio destroys her diary. It tells the story of her return home to Achill, her conflict with her family, the friendships she makes, and the challenges she faces. And somewhere within its pages is an explanation for the looming black hole that's about to destroy the Earth.

Through unique gameplay mechanics, erase anything and everything. Experience a compelling and intense story about family, community, isolation and identity.

Developed by DREAMFEEL. Published by Annapurna Interactive. 

© Annapurna Interactive, 2019
